website_summaries.verdict: It's not perfect, but the nicely priced compact Samsung WB150F camera packs a sharp 18x zoom lens and integrated Wi-Fi so you can email or upload your pics to Facebook easily.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Win 8
customer_reviews.text: I read all the specs. before ordering this camera. The software doesn't work with win 8. I just finished a chat with a Samsung rep. The software called Intilli-stuido isn't compatible with win 8. Without the software it's not possible to upgrade the firmware on the camera. However the camera can be used as a plug and play. You don't need a special driver download. I haven't used to camera for any photos yet. I do have it set up. The buttons and the camera body have a poor build quality feel. I'm going to return the camera and find one that is a little more up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Gordie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Videos....from the camera..no less
customer_reviews.text: I am more amazed at the videos this camera takes..so very clear. I just post a picture to FaceBook or Picasa or others. Also, I can pair the Camera to my TV and / or computer and even my Samsung Tab 7 and Smart phone and play the video or see the pixs. The intention of buying this camera was for the size for easy carrying vs my larger Canon camera. I am a shopper and the price with Amazon was the best around...even with the sale price at best buy. My friend purchased Sony Cyber-shot and he wishes he had purchased the Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Failed to inspect prior to shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Camera itself was functional even if it was banged up. Looked as though it had been dropped on concrete at some point. The battery was dead when the camera arrived and the battery charger supplied did not work. (Tried charging the battery overnight) I charged the battery myself with a cord plugged into the side of the camera, using the camera itself as a battery charger. Battery was fully charged within the hour and only took about 3 dozen photos before it died. Looks like I will need to buy a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: dan simmonds

customer_reviews.title: Super & affordable Camera
customer_reviews.text: While on vacation with my Brother & his wife he showed us his new camera and all it could do. They have been doing Photography for years, typically using the big lenses and winning contests for their photos.... So I knew if he said it was good, it was good. A week after we got home I ordered myself one. Showed my daughter-in-law and she ordered one! This camera is FUN! You can take a picture, and is seconds put it on FB, or email it. It was affordable & had free shipping. Great quality photos!
customer_reviews.author: nobodyveryspecial

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera,beautiful images, easy to use, and nice size! Can you tell I love it? It's my 2nd one
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: but she did not like it. I can't tell you all the reasons
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for another person, but she did not like it. I can't tell you all the reasons, but I do know she complained that it was too slow and the wireless was difficult to set up. She rarely uses it. Your experience might be different, and the review is somewhat second-hand. I helped with some of the technical issues, and I thought the wireless was clunky and too much of a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but Wifi function is not mature enough
customer_reviews.text: I brought this camera for it's WiFi feature since i have many DSC already. I have no complain about picture or video quality but Wireless function is difficut to use. Well, I think it's not their fault, basically, WiFi direct is a new technology so it have long way to go. Think about it. If we can take pictures or video and easily transfer to cell Phone and send to cloud or hosting site. Life will be much easier this way yet the transmittion is too slow especially video. I think I will wait for other technology come out to do video transfer though wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Bman

customer_reviews.title: A Speck
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to figure out, but apparently there is a speck between the lenses which shows up as a blurry dot in the same place on every image. Also I thought I was buying a fancier model, but that's my fault. It does have a nice wide angle. Update - also doesn't have a setting for low resolution pics like 640 x 480 which I needed, but didn't think to look for.
customer_reviews.author: Cable Free Since 2003

customer_reviews.title: so glad that it's rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: great image of pictures and video and it also comes with many different fun settings for image quality. took this with me on vacation in a desert and had no problems at all .I recomend getting a shockproof and protective case against sand and rain,you never know.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to carry in my purse because I don't carry my big camera with me everywhere. This one takes very sharp pics and it's very easy to use. Had an older Samsung that was a great camera as well, but this one has such a great optical zoom for a small point and click-great for those "wish I had my camera with me" moments.
customer_reviews.author: S. Laurence

customer_reviews.title: My mom can use it
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my mom (~50 yrs). The Wifi features and Facebook uploading work well when connected, but it is a bit of a hassle to get connected to Wifi. The memory of hotspots is hard to navigate and most times you need to re-enter the password whenever changing networks. Make sure to configure the Wifi connection if you ill be transmitting pictures from somewhere new.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wood

customer_reviews.title: Terrrific little camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures, and I love the 18x zoom on this camera. The last camera it bought was a Kodak with a 4x optical zoom. It took good pictures if you happened to be close to you suject, but ate up AA batteries; about 5 or 6 pictures with a fresh set. Batteries last a long time with this camera.The price is simply amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Chile

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a camera that was stolen. I knew that I liked this camera before I ordered it. It takes excellent 18x pics. It has wifi for downloading. It's an excellent camera in a small easy-to-carry size.
customer_reviews.author: susan a szoke

customer_reviews.title: Happy and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: With all the brands of the same class, I chose this camera because of its Wifi capabilities. I have tried sending photos with it and it worked. I still need to study its other capabilities as I am only an amateur photographer and so far,its Smart Auto function works well with me.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot for the money. Haven't had any issues with using the built in wi-fi like other have mentioned. Everything works well, menus are easy to navigate and understand. One of my favorite features is the remote viewfinder smartphone app. So many great uses ;)
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: So much for a great price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this camera has an amazing number of features...18x optical zoom, panorama mode, fun frames, and interesting modes that turn you photo into a cartoon, painting or pencil sketch. The Wi-fi connection that allows automatic backup on the computer is a nice feature too.
customer_reviews.author: APMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. Great to carry on trips and you can download the pictures from the camera to your phone if you don't want to wait to upload them to facebook or instagram. I have had mine for a few years now and it's done great!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Lens system failure (retraction?) after a few hours from new
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for the first half of my daughters soccer game after receiving it brand new. Major headache. Lens system failed in the open position and it gives you a suggestion to remove battery and replace that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: jklos

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB150F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Black (ECWB150FBPBUS) from amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: I Was received these Camera a weeks Ago .. I Felt Satisfied About The Package and Box . And Also The Camera is Helpful For Me Because It Has Smart Auto capture which means Its getting Me Easier to take some photos Quickly. Thanks So Much Amazon.Com
customer_reviews.author: Trisetio Wahyuaji

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expert, but this camera has way more features than I expected. I just use the "shoot" function and get great photo. Battery stays charged and the wi fi feature is handy. The one I bought was reconditioned but it seemed to be brand new
customer_reviews.author: Dave in the dirt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Compact and light in weight with a fast zoom lens. The manual features for aperature and shutter priority are useful. I have not tried the auto smile detect feature. I was disappointed the the remote feature using a phone or tablet only works via a wifi network so you cannot use it while outside for nature shots of long exposures which is what I had hoped. It would have been better if it acted as a wifi hub and connected that way. The feature worked with my Nexus 7 tablet, allowing limited zoom and picture taking.
customer_reviews.author: DS Dave

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it! The flash is really bright, which i don't like... but at least she likes it lol. Image is pretty good. Must have steady hands to take good pics. Zoom works welll but image is bad.
customer_reviews.author: kyang

customer_reviews.title: Photo counter went bad
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, really like it. Had the camera for a week. The photo counter started out as 100-0001. Took five photos and the counter jumped up to 100-2886.The next photo was 100-2887 and so forth. Talked to Samsung and they had no solution to fix the counter. Amazon is giving me a full refund on the camera. Will probably purchase the same model when I get my refund from Amazon. Might have been just a burp in the counter. The WiFi part of the camera is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: an excellent replacement camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera because it is just like my old one that quit working. This 'used' camera is just like new; I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: clogged ears

customer_reviews.title: The wifi function is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, especially the wifi function. Those built-in 'apps' also makes picture-taking a lot easier, particularly the panorama app. No need to paste several shots to make a panoramic shot.
customer_reviews.author: WJGBalderama

customer_reviews.title: Love the WIFI and the Apps
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung products, so when it was time for me to get and upgrade a camera I'm so glad I bumped into this. The previous comments on here really helped me a lot to purchase this product and I'm totally happy with the purchase. Just the price alone is unbeatable and w/ 14MP and 18x Optical Zoom, this is exactly what I need for my travels next year! The WIFI will help tremendously, my photos will automatically sync to my PC so I can delete files on the SD Card on the go if needed to create more memory :)
customer_reviews.author: piamomia

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera I love the smart button that chooses which scene for you so you don't have to pick low light and bright I also like the airless feature that lets you load to your phone or tablet this is my first camera and years I love that it have a speaker on it for when you play back videos. There also is a neat application that lets you remote in with your phone I set the camera up on my coworkers desk and took a picture of her scarfing down some doritos very funny for me I have been using that a lot to take picutres with my kids with asking someone to hold the camera
customer_reviews.author: Kela

customer_reviews.title: Good overall camera with some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: The 18-inch optical zoom is a plus for taking both photos and videos, especially under daylight conditions. Photo quality is very good in daylight. But in low-light conditions, the video is grainy and the flash is slow to recharge. Also, the range of the flash is very limited. A nice feature is the shutter speed/ aperture priority function when you want to turn off the program mode. For a small camera, it takes very good photos and video in daylight conditions and I can recommend the camera for daylight use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB150F
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera for the price; I wanted a camera with a good zoom I could still fit in my pocket at a moderate price and this fits. Also worked well with the wi-fi; for the price, a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting sharp photos from this little camera. It's especially nice for macro photos of flowers and insects. It's easy to carry along everywhere. I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Logue

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I pick this up as a gift and she loved it does everything she wanted as her old camera was so out dated so over all this camera is a good quick and shoot camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: lakelandguy

customer_reviews.title: After a few uses, it does not connect to Facebook and Samsung did not respond my inquiry about it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really good, I am happy with my purchase, but after a few uses, it does not connect to Facebook to post my pictures wirelessly. It all started after I installed the camera software in my computer. I sent the question to Samsung last week and they still have not come back to me with a solution to the problem, it is a pity since the camera is nice, picture resolution is acceptable for the price I paid and the wireless feature saves you time. So I am not changing the qualification until Samsung gives proper feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Adalberto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have every purchased. I love the wifi capabilities it offers. On vacation, just click and load directly to your email or facebook! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Neglia

customer_reviews.title: great camera with so many features
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a fantastic bang for the buck. You get so many useful features and a long zoom that works great. My only recommendation is to put it in the p setting and adjust the settings to achieve great pictures. Overall some of the great features and for the low price seem to make this camera a great choice. It even has a German made lens.
customer_reviews.author: C. Church

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB150F Long zoom Smart Camera Black
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera.....easy to use for a Senior......pictures come out great......easy to put on computer to show friends and family.......
customer_reviews.author: Roselle Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this camera. So easy to use and make very good pictures. Samsung digital cameras will surely be the camera of the future.
customer_reviews.author: bisdak

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Camera
customer_reviews.text: awesome camera. does all it says it will and then some. great for traveling as it is small enough to fit in pocket. fantastic telephoto lens-. takes nice sharp images. would recommend this camera for all to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Runaway

customer_reviews.title: smart camera
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this camera for a cousin, she know about cameras , and she really liked it, it's basic but really really good.
customer_reviews.author: Priscila Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Such a great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the best cameras out there. I love how it works with my Samsung phone. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes very nice quality photos. Like to have a camera handy when the grandkids are around and this fits in my pocket easily. Downloading photos to the computer is really easy with the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB150F works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is smart, light, and works like a charm. Easy set up and use. Connectivity to internet thru wi-fi, makes it a 100% winner for me. Exactly what I wanted, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Tungate

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact.
customer_reviews.text: A good little camera. We take it on all our hikes which are many.. The video is good. In low light it is a little grainy. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Pyles

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: What a great little camera for so little money.. Does everything I need it to do..makes great pictures and love the fact I can send them directly to Facebook
customer_reviews.author: Maltese Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pictures arnt the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance for Christmas and honestly the pictures are not great. My phone takes much better pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of them now. Love this camera. Excellent in every feature you would want from a point & shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures, easy to use, great to send pictures to friend thru the Wi-Fi. Excellent for the photo enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Zulu

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good photo quality. Turn on speed is excellent. Takes my 32gb XDSD card without a problem. Optical zoom is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Castine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It actually works even though my left hand shakes! User friendly, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Abbott-Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom
customer_reviews.text: The zoom in this camera is really impressive. It has many useful shooting modes. The WiFi thing is kind of "basic" and is nothing to be impressed by. Although over all, I am happy with it. =)
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is camera has exceeded my expectations! It has so many great features for anyone and for an excellent price. This camera has helped me to greatly expand my business. It takes quality pictures in no time at all and being able to email the pictures to upload is the greatest part. It saves me time for work and allows me to share my family with my loved ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kmh

customer_reviews.title: Compact camera
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung WB150F is truly a smart camera. The zoom is incredible, the video is awesome. I have several digital cameras but this is by far the best. The clarity of the pics is unparalleled. It is so compact it will fit in my shirt pocket. I couyldn't be happier. Thanks Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Zoom broke after 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: zoom and shutter have broken after only 4 months. This was a christmas gift and was broked by 4/1/13. I am dissaptointed with the samsung camera and will not be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Zoom doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The zoom on my camera won't adjust, or retract...just zooms out fully and won't focus. It then freezes and I have to turn off the camera to continue. I don't have time to return it before a trip to New Zealand, so I guess I'll have to carry my old camera also in case anything else goes wrong with this one. Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes excellent pictures. It has as many features as anybody should ever need or can be as simple as point and shoot! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live surrounded by mountains, so I was goofing around when my camera arrived and went outside to test the zoom, and honestly, I've found houses I had never seen before in my life!!! Such a pretty camera, haven't test the wifi yet (I don't have that kind of internet where my house is) and is so tiny. I mean compared with my brothers camera (a big Cannon camera of "God knows it's zoom range is, 'cause I don't remember" but I'm pretty sure is 20x ) is so easy to carry... Would defenitely recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Enid

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 stars if . . . . .
customer_reviews.text: The Wi-Fi backup to a PC was a problem. We had two cameras identifying with different PCs in the office. Wi-Fi backup using camera "B" activated the software installed on camera "A". So, it was back to wires for offloading pictures. Other than that the camera is excellent with outstanding picture quality and ease of use. Had the Wi-Fi worked as described, this would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend this camera because it has great zoom and Wi-Fi ...
customer_reviews.text: I Recommend this camera because it has great zoom and Wi-Fi a plus
customer_reviews.author: Augusta

customer_reviews.title: Cool features... Not so cool photos
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint with this camera was the photo quality. I could never seem to get the coloring right. When I took pictures on Auto everyone's faces were completely washed out and every feature I tried I couldn't seem to fix that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anna9882

customer_reviews.title: It won't zoom
customer_reviews.text: Hugely disappointed. Used it only a couple of times and the zoom won't open. It was taking great pictures up until then. I am really upset by this. I use my cameras a lot. Now I have to figure out where to go to get it fixed!! Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jane Brouse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We like the new camera, nice to take a picture and put it right on FaceBook! Thanks John and Karen
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fry

customer_reviews.title: The camera I bought from the seller is extremely good and works as a new camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera I bought from the seller is extremely good and works as a new camera. I am extremely contented as I am using this frequently to shoot all kinds of pictures in it. I have no other say except to say that I am fully satisfied beyond its price-worth.
customer_reviews.author: jegathsam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Great service as always from Amazon's end, but this is the most frustrating camera I have every owned. Camera constantly freezes in the middle of taking photos. Pros: Tons of features for price point. Cons: Poor quality. Unreliable photos.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, takes great picture and has and awesome zoom. The wifi feature is really good but the only down fall of this feature is that the camera doesnt have a touch screen to lable the pics and folders. You have to use the arrow keys and ok buttons to enter text which is tedious and almost makes you not want to use the feature (this is why I bought the camera. the only other minor down fall is it doesnt have the panoramic mode like the iphone or some other cameras on the market. These are the only two complaints I have but all in all this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Does everything very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. One of the grandkids got their hands on the first one and broke it. My wife liked it so well that when I wanted to buy a more expensive camera she wouldn't hear of it. She wanted this exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: ole olson

customer_reviews.title: I very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a super good camera, it meets my expetativas, excellent image quality and zoom has good range also has the facility of a video shows more photos
customer_reviews.author: Olyery B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm a home inspector and take a lot of pictures, The quality of the pictures is great. The 18x zoom really comes in handy...I have had it about a month so far and love it.
customer_reviews.author: steven r tremaine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It was shipped on time and in and it also was shipped in a safe package. good .
customer_reviews.author: erod

customer_reviews.title: Came in great condition (better than expected)
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition (better than expected), and i haven't used it much, but so far so good. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: compact size, bright display, oustanding pictures, and amazing optical zoom! i'm very pleased by this product! i'm just waiting to give it an software update and discovers what new features come with it!
customer_reviews.author: JLLE21

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like several others, I was looking for a camera that could connect to the Internet easily. Love to post pictures as soon as I can. I wanted to be able to zoom in better than my iPhone could. This seemed like it was going to be perfect. Wrong. Picture quality is poor. Slow shutter speed. WiFi and Facebook connection slow and labor intensive. So in a nutshell, a waste of money. So disappointed. Now I have to start my search all over again. I should have paid more attention to the 1-2 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased Mom

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB150F
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to update my old one and on a friend's recommendation. Could not be happier! Awesome camera. Very happy with my pictures and features.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Aviles

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS LITTLE GUY! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to catch my pets or outside critters doing crazy things. Absolutely love it! Use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jo J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive camera that is easy to use and takes fabulous pictures. I highly recommend it for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: saga62

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have done more research on cameras.. I thought the smart camera would be fun but we don't use that feature at all on the camera.. and the picture quality for us and the shutter speed is lacking on this camera. If you are buying this camera for action shots or children that are on the move don't buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Samsung WB150F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Black (ECWB150FBPBUS)< this camera is not what I really intended to order. but so far it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wireless connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: Although this camera got decent revues, we had nothing but problems trying to connect to wireless networks. I tried two different networks and it never did connect, kept having error messages. i contacted Samsung support but they were baffled. The ONLY reason to get this camera, IMO, is for the wireless capability. Without that there is nothing special about it at all, and you can probably get a better camera for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera with easy to use functions
customer_reviews.text: I would reccommend this camera because it has built in WIFI and can be remotely take pictures with other Samsung devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mano K Ponna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera...  Bought for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter who does alot on Facebook. She loved the compatability with it. Great buy! Amazing capabilities... Exactly what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Gran

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: A camera is fascinating, takes good pictures day and night, is lightweight and is the perfect gift at a low price
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, my wife loves it and its wifi feature. She can post pics directly from the camera to Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: It's very good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product with all the features for which a common man can want to use it. I can say it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Vishal

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest to use cameras I have owned. Love the wifi feature. Pictures are crisp and clean even at night and the zoom works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bortz

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: several of my friend already have this camera, so I knew it was awesome, , the price was right so I bought one for our job site.
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB150 Long Zoom with WiFi Capability
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera and has all the latest features WiFi Too
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J.

customer_reviews.title: Sets up easy, works well
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving my Samsung WB150f, I went through the startup process with no difficulty. Once set up, took a few pictures, and am very happy with the quality of the photos. Next I connected to my home WiFi network and emailed 1 photo from the camera without an issue. Love it and would put up 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Deanotb

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Simple to use but yet packed with features. Good quality pictures. Much easier to use than many cameras that I looked at. Best feature--my wife is can use it without my help.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Muy buena
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very good. The pictures that i have taken are simply awesome. Good price. Everything was perfect. J
customer_reviews.author: juan jaider reales

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera. It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy to understand instructions and the large 3.0" LCD. I am looking forward to talking terrific pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Brinkerhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a picky 13-year-old amateur photographer. He's been using it since Christmas and playing with all the different settings and pronounced it "awesome." In addition, the wi-fi transfer is extremely handy.
customer_reviews.author: TjP

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooo in love with this camera!!! Awesome point and shoot camera with many easy to use feature. The wifi is wonderful. The battery life is also AWESOME!! Shutter speed is very fast. I have brought several point and shot camera in the last year since my other camera died and have returned them all. Very very very very happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: evo4

customer_reviews.title: If I can take great pics with this, anyone can
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, Its very user friendly. The colors are bright and crisp. People have asked me about the camera because the pictures look so good.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this camera. For it's price range it is nice. I would recommend it to the average buyer.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: This was a rip off. The camera was grey ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a rip off. The camera was grey market and I had to pay $10 to return it. The listing said nothing about it not having a US warranty. Don't buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Philip R. LeVine

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. Just love it. I love the artistic shots and the zoom quality. Another great thing is the wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Good Point & Shoot
customer_reviews.text: Good POINT AND SHOOT camera, but did not have the quality that I needed. Gave it away as a gift to my grandson who it having a great time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Takes excellent pic. Very happy with it. Just wish it has touch screen for entering info when uploading pics to facebook etc.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shippy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something between a plain point and shoot with hardly any zooming ability and a full SLR..this is it! the zoom is all i need, and i love the burst photo ability...and wifi? it's awesome!! i email and post my pics constanty....the convenience of taking with a cell phone and sending to friends except way better quality! I wish I'd had this months ago...i love it! and small i can stick right in my purse, no problem...love love love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Coats

customer_reviews.title: My new Samsung Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my camera, however the box that it arrived in was in terrible shape. It was open, but thankfully the camera was still in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Ahrenholtz

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: it is heavy, thick and inefficient. the telescope was not going out for few times and the are knocking noises from it
customer_reviews.author: yuval cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has great features. Had a problem with Wi-Fi at a McDonald's but normally works fine. This a great starter camera.
customer_reviews.author: A. David

product_meta.title: Samsung WB150F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Black (ECWB150FBPBUS) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: The WB150F Samsung SMART Camera uses a powerful 18x Optical zoom to take brilliant photos that you will want to share instantly with family and friends. Using the camera's built-in wireless functionality, you can upload high quality photos to social networking sites and seamlessly sync your camera to other SMART devices (TV, phone, and tablet). Plus you can easily transfer all of your memories to your computer, Smartphone, or Microsoft Skydive with the touch of a button.
